ygData.subject: Enter the Jungle!
ygData.msgSnippet: As the party quickly moves away from the clearing and towards the jungle, the area foliage quickly becomes much denser. As they are still following a trail

As the party quickly moves away from the clearing and towards the jungle, t=
he area foliage quickly becomes much denser. As they are still following a =
trail they are still able to pass through it relatively easily, but at the =
sides of the trail the brush and plants are becoming thicker and greener. H=
owever as we have night still falling, the way ahead is getting darker, and=
 the gnarled tree limbs beginning to look as much like claws as they do woo=
d. 

For those who have chosen to fly. Before them would be what appears to=
 be an a dark ocean of or dark green water complete with waves as the tops =
of tress move lazily in response to unseen breezes. The sky itself is clear=
 and bright, very little in the way of cloud cover and the moon is just beg=
inning to make itself seen as it rises up over the horizon of trees. A casu=
al gaze downward shows the rest of the group walking along, wether in robot=
 mode or beast mode, but a quick glance ahead showed that in very short ord=
er the group below will be harder and harder to locate due to the every inc=
reasing density of the plant life. 

For those who were burrowing along und=
erground, even their way was becoming slowed with the massive entanglement =
of roots that sat just beneath the surface of the ground. 

However for all=
 teams there is one constant. Within the space of a mile the communications=
 go from crystal clear to non-existent. Even the IFF com-signal goes down, =
and everyone is restricted to sensory recognition only. Even sensors are mu=
ffled somewhat, although visual, audio and olfactory senses appear to be un=
affected. 

At the front of the group on the ground LEO PRIME walked in bea=
st mode, a lion stalking through the jungle, looking completely at home her=
e. TORCA, who was in an almost nightmarerish fusion of elephant and killer =
whale walked next to him, and on the other side was SANTON in his MAMMOTH b=
east mode. 

Around these three ranges the rest of the Maxmals, some in the=
 air, like AIRHAMMER, NOCTORRO and WINGCALIBER while there were others on t=
he ground like BANTOR. 

Then again the PREDACONS were here too, making the=
ir presence felt as they flew and walked. SKYSHADOW was in the air in beast=
 mode along with BUZZCLAW and INJECTOR, while QUICKSTRIKE and TERRORGATOR w=
alked on the ground. 

"This way!" LEO PRIME said as he walked on. "The sig=
nal is coming from this way." He was carrying the makeshift tracking device=
, its signal taking him darker and darker into the dark of the Jungle!

OOC=
: I am not sure who is flying and who is walking. Most I can make assumptio=
ns on. Is Hydras flying or walking, I am not sure if the Hydra has wings? A=
lso is Buzzsaw going to be flying above the trees or just below the treelin=
e. Either one is possible, although it will call for some fancy flying to s=
tay below as the trees get denser. 

(TAG)

Preston
